title: Grandmaster Combat Achievements

properties.name: description
properties.value: Grandmaster Combat Achievements tasks require the highest combat levels, the absolute best equipment available, and precise, in-depth knowledge of a bosses mechanics, with the ability to skillfully kill said bosses and deal with their mechanics perfectly without mistakes.

content:
Grandmaster Combat Achievements tasks require the highest combat levels, the absolute best equipment available, and precise, in-depth knowledge of a bosses mechanics, with the ability to skillfully kill said bosses and deal with their mechanics perfectly without mistakes.

Contents

  • 1 Requirements
  • 2 Tasks
  • 3 Rewards

Requirements[edit | edit source]

Items
  • Brittle key to access the Grotesque Guardians
  • Dharok's greataxe to complete No Pressure
  • Any salamander to complete The Worst Ranged Weapon
Skills
  • 95 Slayer(not boostable)
Quests
  • Dragon Slayer II
  • The Frozen Door
  • Song of the Elves

Tasks[edit | edit source]

There are a total of 76 grandmaster-tier tasks for the Combat Achievements system.

Monster Name Description Category
Alchemical Hydra Alchemical Speed-Runner Kill the Alchemical Hydra in less than 1 minute 20 seconds. Speed
Alchemical Hydra No Pressure Kill the Alchemical Hydra using only Dharok's Greataxe as a weapon whilst having no more than 10 Hitpoints throughout the entire fight. Restriction
Chambers of Xeric Chambers of Xeric (Trio) Speed-Runner Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Trio) in less than 14 minutes and 30 seconds. Speed
Chambers of Xeric Chambers of Xeric (5-Scale) Speed-Runner Complete a Chambers of Xeric (5-scale) in less than 12 minutes and 30 seconds. Speed
Chambers of Xeric Chambers of Xeric (Solo) Speed-Runner Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Solo) in less than 17 minutes. Speed
Chambers of Xeric Chambers of Xeric Grandmaster Complete the Chambers of Xeric 150 times. Kill count
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Chambers of Xeric: CM (Trio) Speed-Runner Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (Trio) in less than 27 minutes. Speed
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Chambers of Xeric: CM (5-Scale) Speed-Runner Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (5-scale) in less than 25 minutes. Speed
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Chambers of Xeric: CM (Solo) Speed-Runner Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (Solo) in less than 38 minutes and 30 seconds. Speed
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Chambers of Xeric: CM Grandmaster Complete the Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode 25 times. Kill count
Commander Zilyana Peach Conjurer Kill Commander Zilyana 50 times in a privately rented instance without leaving the room. Stamina
Commander Zilyana Animal Whisperer Kill Commander Zilyana in a privately rented instance without taking any damage from the boss or bodyguards. Perfection
The Corrupted Gauntlet Corrupted Gauntlet Speed-Runner Complete a Corrupted Gauntlet in less than 6 minutes and 30 seconds. Speed
The Corrupted Gauntlet Wolf Puncher II Kill the Corrupted Hunllef without making more than one attuned weapon. Restriction
The Corrupted Gauntlet Egniol Diet II Kill the Corrupted Hunllef without making an egniol potion within the Corrupted Gauntlet. Restriction
The Corrupted Gauntlet Corrupted Gauntlet Grandmaster Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet 50 times. Kill count
Fight Caves Fight Caves Speed-Runner Complete the Fight Caves in less than 26 minutes and 30 seconds. Speed
Fight Caves No Time for a Drink Complete the Fight Caves without losing any prayer points. Restriction
Fight Caves Denying the Healers II Complete the Fight Caves without TzTok-Jad being healed by a Yt-HurKot. Mechanical
The Gauntlet Gauntlet Speed-Runner Complete the Gauntlet in less than 4 minutes. Speed
General Graardor Ourg Killer Kill General Graardor 15 times in a privately rented instance without leaving the room. Stamina
General Graardor Keep Away Kill General Graardor in a privately rented instance without taking any damage from the boss or bodyguards. Perfection
General Graardor Defence Matters Kill General Graardor 2 times consecutively in a privately rented instance without taking any damage from his bodyguards. Perfection
Grotesque Guardians Grotesque Guardians Speed-Runner Kill the Grotesque Guardians in less than 1:20 minutes. Speed
Inferno Inferno Speed-Runner Complete the Inferno in less than 65 minutes. Speed
Inferno Jad? What Are You Doing Here? Kill Tzkal-Zuk without killing the JalTok-Jad which spawns during wave 69. Restriction
Inferno Facing Jad Head-on II Kill Tzkal-Zuk without equipping any range or mage weapons before wave 69. Restriction
Inferno Nibbler Chaser Kill Tzkal-Zuk without using any magic spells during any wave in the Inferno. Restriction
Inferno Budget Setup Kill Tzkal-Zuk without equipping a Twisted Bow within the Inferno. Restriction
Inferno Wasn't Even Close Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting your hitpoints fall below 50 during any wave in the Inferno. Restriction
Inferno No Luck Required Kill Tzkal-Zuk without being attacked by TzKal-Zuk and without taking damage from a JalTok-Jad. Perfection
Inferno Playing with Jads Complete wave 68 of the Inferno within 30 seconds of the first JalTok-Jad dying. Mechanical
Inferno The Floor Is Lava Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting Jal-ImKot dig during any wave in the Inferno. Mechanical
Inferno Inferno Grandmaster Complete the Inferno 5 times. Kill count
K'ril Tsutsaroth Ash Collector Kill K'ril Tsutsaroth 20 times in a privately rented instance without leaving the room. Stamina
K'ril Tsutsaroth Demon Whisperer Kill K'ril Tsutsaroth in a privately rented instance without ever being hit by his bodyguards. Perfection
Kree'arra Feather Hunter Kill Kree'arra 30 times in a privately rented instance without leaving the room. Stamina
Kree'arra The Worst Ranged Weapon Kill Kree'arra by only dealing damage to him with a salamander. Restriction
Nex Nex Duo Kill Nex with two or less players at the start of the fight. Restriction
Nex I should see a doctor Kill Nex whilst a player is coughing. Restriction
Nex Perfect Nex Kill Nex whilst completing the requirements for "There is no escape", "Shadows move", "A siphon will solve this", and "Contain this!" Perfection
The Nightmare Nightmare (5-Scale) Speed-Runner Defeat the Nightmare (5-scale) in less than 3:30 minutes. Speed
The Nightmare Nightmare (Solo) Speed-Runner Defeat the Nightmare (Solo) in less than 16 minutes. Speed
The Nightmare A Long Trip Kill the Nightmare without any player losing any prayer points. Restriction
The Nightmare Terrible Parent Kill the Nightmare solo without the Parasites healing the boss for more than 100 health. Mechanical
Phosani's Nightmare Phosani's Grandmaster Kill Phosani's Nightmare 25 times. Kill count
Phosani's Nightmare Perfect Phosani's Nightmare Kill Phosani's Nightmare while only taking damage from husks, power blasts and weakened Parasites. Also, without having your attacks slowed by the Nightmare Spores or letting a Sleepwalker reach Phosani's Nightmare. Perfection
Phosani's Nightmare Can't Wake Up Kill Phosani's Nightmare 5 times in a row without leaving Phosani's Dream. Stamina
Phosani's Nightmare Phosani's Speedrunner Defeat Phosani's Nighmare within 7:30 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood Theatre (5-Scale) Speed-Runner Complete the Theatre of Blood (5-scale) in less than 14 minutes and 15 seconds. Speed
Theatre of Blood Theatre (4-Scale) Speed-Runner Complete the Theatre of Blood (4-scale) in less than 15 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood Theatre (Trio) Speed-Runner Complete the Theatre of Blood (Trio) in less than 17 minutes and 30 seconds. Speed
Theatre of Blood Theatre (Duo) Speed-Runner Complete the Theatre of Blood (Duo) in less than 26 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood Morytania Only Complete the Theatre of Blood without any member of the team equipping a non-barrows weapon (except Dawnbringer). Restriction
Theatre of Blood Perfect Theatre Complete the Theatre of Blood without anyone dying through any means and whilst everyone in the team completes the following Combat Achievement tasks in a single run: "Perfect Maiden", "Perfect Bloat", "Perfect Nylocas", "Perfect Sotetseg", "Perfect Xarpus" and "Perfect Verzik". Perfection
Theatre of Blood Theatre of Blood Grandmaster Complete the Theatre of Blood 150 times. Kill count
Theatre of Blood (HM) Theatre of Blood: HM Grandmaster Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode 50 times. Kill count
Theatre of Blood (HM) Theatre: HM (5-Scale) Speed-Runner Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (5-scale) with an overall time of less than 19 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood (HM) Theatre: HM (4-Scale) Speed-Runner Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (4-scale) with an overall time of less than 21 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood (HM) Theatre: HM (Trio) Speed-Runner Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (Trio) with an overall time of less than 23 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood (HM) Pack Like a Yak Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode within the challenge time, with no deaths and without anyone buying anything from a supply chest. Restriction
Theatre of Blood (HM) Harder Mode III Defeat Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone attacking her with a melee weapon during her third phase. Restriction
Theatre of Blood (HM) Team Work Makes the Dream Work When Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode uses her yellow power blast attack while the tornadoes are active, have everyone get through the attack without taking damage. This cannot be completed with one player alive Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (HM) Nylo Sniper Defeat Verzik Vitur's in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone in your team causing a Nylocas to explode by getting too close. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (HM) Harder Mode II Defeat Xarpus in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode after letting the exhumeds heal him to full health and without anyone in the team taking any damage. Perfection
Theatre of Blood (HM) Harder Mode I Defeat Sotetseg in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone sharing the ball with anyone, without anyone dying, and without anyone taking damage from any of its other attacks or stepping on the wrong tile in the maze. Perfection
Theatre of Blood (HM) Royal Affairs In the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode, complete the Nylocas room without ever letting the Nylocas Prinkipas change styles. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (HM) Personal Space Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode with a least 3 people in the room, without anyone in your team standing on top of each other. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood (HM) Stop Right There! Defeat the Maiden of Sugadinti in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without letting blood spawns create more than 15 blood trails. Mechanical
TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges It Wasn't a Fluke Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fifth and sixth challenges back to back without failing. Perfection
TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Runner Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fifth challenge in less than 5 minutes. Speed
TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges The VI Jad Challenge Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's sixth challenge. Kill count
Vorkath Vorkath Speed-Runner Kill Vorkath in less than 54 seconds. Speed
Vorkath The Fremennik Way Kill Vorkath with only your fists. Restriction
Vorkath Faithless Encounter Kill Vorkath without losing any prayer points. Restriction
Zulrah Zulrah Speed-Runner Kill Zulrah in less than 54 seconds, without a slayer task. Speed

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • An antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • Ghommal's hilt 6
    • Unlimited daily teleports to Mor Ul Rek (within the inner city)
  • Like a boss slayer unlock will now allow players to have up to 50 boss kills (a +15 increase) when assigned a boss task
  • Slayer tasks to kill TzTok-Jad or TzKal-Zuk are increased to 3 kills per task
  • God Wars Dungeon benefits:
    • God Wars Dungeon boss entrances now require 30 follower kill count to enter instead of 33
    • Ecumenical key drop rate is now increased from 1/45 to 1/40
    • Coin cost for God Wars Dungeon privately rented instances is reduced from 100,000 to 75,000 coins
  • Ghommal can make players a Tzkal slayer helmet
